subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In the decades since the Chicago Cubs’ 23-22 loss to the Philadelphia Phillies, cities have built cozier ballparks and players have bulked up. Yet nothing has matched that game.
snippet: In the decades since the Chicago Cubs’ 23-22 loss to the Philadelphia Phillies, cities have built cozier ballparks and players have bulked up. Yet nothing has matched that game.
